casebody.data:
Third Department,

December, 1950.

(December 1, 1950.) In the Matter of the Probate of the Will of Richard M. Schell, Deceased. Alice S. Porcher, Appellant; Bank of New York & Fifth Avenue Bank, Individually and as Executor of and Trustee under the Will of Richard M. Schell, Deceased, et al., Respondents.

Motion for reargument denied. Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted, without costs, and this court certifies that in its opinion questions of law have arisen which ought to be reviewed by the Court of Appeals. Motion by respondents to dismiss appeal granted, without costs. Present — Foster, P. J., Heffernan, Deyo, Bergan and Coon, JJ. [See ante, p. 513.] [See 278 App. Div. 876.]
